#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,n;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    //printf("%lld\n",t);
    while(t-->0)
    {
              scanf("%lld",&n);
              while(n>1 && !(n%2))
                        n/=2;
              if(n<=1)
                      printf("No\n");
              else
                      printf("Yes\n");
                      }
   // getch();
    return 0;
    }
